## Built With

* [RStudio](http://www.dropwizard.io/1.0.2/docs/) - IDE for R
* [Flexdashboards](https://maven.apache.org/) - Easy, flexible dashboards using the Shiny apps framework
* [Apache Drill](https://rometools.github.io/rome/) - Used to connect R with a variety of backend NoSQL database
* [Sergeant]() - Tools to Transform and Query Data with Apache 'Drill'
